src: „Teraz máme 4-mesačné myši, ktoré už nemajú diabetes a ktoré ho predtým mali,“ dodal.
mt: “Now we have 4-month-old mice that no longer have diabetes and did before,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor medicíny na univerzite Dalhousie v Halifaxe v Novom Škótsku a predseda klinickej a vedeckej divízie Kanadskej diabetologickej asociáce, pripomínal, že výskum je stále v začiatkoch.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, noted that the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Rovnako ako niektorí ďalší odborníci pochybuje o tom, že sa dá cukrovka liečiť, a poznamenáva, že tieto zistenia nemajú žiadny význam pre ľudí, ktorí už cukrovku 1. typu majú.
mt: As with other experts, he doubts that diabetes can be cured, and notes that these findings have no relevance to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: V pondelok Sara Danius, stála tajomníčka Nobelovho výboru pre literatúru na Švédskej akadémii, počas rozhlasového programu vo švédskom rozhlase Sveriges verejne oznámila, že výbor sa nedokázal priamo spojiť s Bobom Dylanom v súvislosti so získaním Nobelovej ceny za literatúru za rok 2016.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, during a radio program in Swedish Radio Sveriges, announced that the committee was unable to directly contact Bob Dylan in connection with the awarding of the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius povedal: „Momentálne nerobíme nič. Telefonoval som a poslal som e-maily jeho najbližšiemu spolupracovníkovi a dostal som veľmi priateľské odpovede. Nateraz to určite stačí.“
mt: Danius said: "We're not doing anything right now. I've called and emailed his closest collaborator and got very friendly responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Generálny riaditeľ spoločnosti Ring, Jamie Siminoff, predtým poznamenal, že spoločnosť vznikla, keď nebolo počuť zvonček z jeho garážového obchodu.
mt: Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff previously noted that the company was founded when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his garage store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Vytvoril podľa neho WiFi zvonček na dvere.
mt: He created a doorbell that uses WiFi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff uviedol, že predaj sa zvýšil po jeho vystúpení v roku 2013 v epizóde šou Shark Tank, kedy porota odmietla financovať startup.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the show Shark Tank in 2013, when the panel rejected funding the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Koncom roku 2017 sa Siminoff objavil na teleshoppingovej stanici QVC.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring tiež urovnal súdny spor s konkurenčnou bezpečnostnou spoločnosťou ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also settled a court dispute with rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Aj keď sa zdá, že jedna experimentálna vakcína dokáže znížiť úmrtnosť na ebolu, doteraz sa jednoznačne nepreukázalo, že by nejaké lieky boli vhodné na liečbu už existujúcej infekcie.
mt: While it appears that one experimental vaccine can reduce mortality from Ebola, it has not yet been definitively proven that any drugs are effective in treating an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Protilátkový koktail ZMapp spočiatku vyzeral v tejto oblasti sľubne, ale oficiálne štúdie uvádzajú, že pri prevencii smrti mal menší úžitok, ako sa dúfalo.
mt: The Ebola antiviral cocktail ZMapp initially looked promising in this area, but official studies indicate that it had a smaller benefit in preventing death than was hoped.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: V triale PALM, ZMapp slúžila ako kontrola, čo znamená, že ju vedci použili ako základ, s ktorým porovnali ostatné tri liečby.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning that researchers used it as a baseline to compare other three treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics podporuje list Olympijského výboru Spojených štátov a prijíma absolútnu nevyhnutnosť podpory bezpečného prostredia pre všetkých našich športovcov Olympijskou rodinou.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and accepts the absolute necessity of supporting a safe environment for all our athletes by the Olympic family.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Súhlasíme s vyhlásením USOC, že záujmom našich športovcov, klubov a ich športu môže skôr poslúžiť uskutočňovanie zmysluplných zmien v našej organizácii ako v odoberanie ich certifikátov.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that the best interests of our athletes, clubs and sport are better served by implementing meaningful reforms in our organization than by revoking their accreditations.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics podporuje nezávislé vyšetrovanie, ktoré môže osvetliť, ako mohlo zneužívanie takých rozmerov, ako ho odvážne popísali obete Larryho Nassara zostať tak dlho nezistené a prijíma všetky nevyhnutné a potrebné zmeny.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shed light on how abuse of such magnitude, as described by Nassar's victims, could have gone undetected for so long and accepts all necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics a USOC majú rovnaký cieľ – dosiahnuť v športoch ako gymnastika čo najvyššiu úroveň bezpečnosti, aby mohli športovci kráčať za svojimi snami v bezpečnom, pozitívnom a podpornom prostredí.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC share the same goal – to achieve the highest level of safety in sports like gymnastics so athletes can walk their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Brzezinski v 1960-tych rokoch pracoval ako poradca Johna F. Kennedyho a potom pre administratívu Lyndona B. Johnsona.
mt: Brzezinski worked as an advisor to John F. Kennedy in the 1960s and then for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Počas volieb v roku 1976 pôsobil ako poradca v oblasti zahraničnej politiky pre Cartera, potom pôsobil ako poradca pre národnú bezpečnosť v rokoch 1977 až 1981 a vystriedal Henryho Kissingera.
mt: 1976 presidential campaign, Carter served as a foreign policy adviser, then served as a national security adviser from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Vo funkcii poradcu pre národnú bezpečnosť pomáhal Carterovi pri diplomatickom riešení svetových udalostí. Konkrétene išlo napríklad o Dohody z Camp Davidu z roku 1978; koncom 1970-tych rokov zase o normalizáciu vzťahov medzi USA a Čínou Potom to bola ránska revolúcia, ktorá viedla k iránskej rukojemníckej kríze v 1979; a invázia Sovietov do Afganistanu, 1979.
mt: He served as a national security advisor to Carter during the Camp David Accords of 1978, and later the normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s. He was also involved in the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film, v ktorom hrajú Ryan Gosling a Emma Stone, získal nominácie vo všetkých hlavných kategóriách.
mt: 2016 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling a Stoneová získali nominácie na najlepšieho herca a herečku.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ďalšie nominácie sú za najlepší film, réžiu, kameru, kostýmy, strih filmu, originálnu hudbu, produkčný dizajn, strih zvuku, mix zvuku a pôvodný scenár.
mt: Other nominations are for best film, direction, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original music score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dve piesne z filmu, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) a City of Stars, získali nominácie na najlepšiu pôvodnú pieseň. Štúdio Lionsgate získalo 26 nominácií – viac ako ktorékoľvek iné štúdio.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: V nedeľu večer americký prezident Donald Trump vo svojom vyhlásení prostredníctvom tlačového tajomníka oznámil, že americké vojenské jednotky odídu zo Sýrie.
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a statement through his press secretary that U.S. military units are leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Táto správa bolo uverejnená po telefonáte Trumpa s tureckým prezidentom Recepom Tayyipom Erdoğanom.
mt: This report was released after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turecko by prevzalo aj stráženie zajatých bojovníkov ISIS, o ktorých sa uvádza, že európske národy odmietli ich repatriáciu.
mt: Turkey would also take custody of ISIS fighters, who are said to be refused repatriation by European nations.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Nielenže to potvrdzuje už veľmi rozšírenú teóriu, že aspoň niektoré dinosaury boli operené, ale poskytuje aj podrobnosti o tom, ktoré fosílie všeobecne nemohli byť, medzi nimi farba a trojrozmerné usporiadanie.
mt: Not only does it confirm the very widely accepted theory that at least some dinosaurs were feathered, but it also provides details about which fossils could not have been, including color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Vedci tvrdia, že operenie tohto zvieraťa bolo zvrchu gaštanovohnedé, naspodu bledej alebo karotenoidovej farby.
mt: Researchers say the animal's fur was reddish-brown on top and yellowish or carotenoid-colored on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Nález takisto poskytuje detailný pohľad na vývoj peria vtákov.
mt: The find also provides a detailed look at the evolution of bird wings.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Keďže perie dinosaura nemá dobre vyvinutú kostrnku nazývanú rachis, ale má iné znaky peria – ostne a lúče – vedci usúdili, že rachis sa pravdepodobne vyvinula evolučne neskôr než tieto ďalšie znaky.
mt: Because the dinosaur's feathers lack a well-developed bone called the rachis, but have other feather characteristics – quills and barbs – scientists concluded that the rachis probably evolved later than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Štruktúra peria naznačuje, že neboli používané za letu, ale skôr na reguláciu teploty alebo na dvorenie. Podľa tvrdenia vedcov, aj keď tu ide o chvost mladého dinosaura, na vzorke je zobrazené perie dospelého jedinca a nie páperie mláďaťa.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used in flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. According to the researchers, although this is the tail of a juvenile dinosaur, the specimen shows the feathers of an adult, not the down of a juvenile.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Aj keď ide o chvost mladého dinosaura, na vzorke je podľa vedcov perie dospelého jedinca a nie páperie mláďaťa.
mt: Even though it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen has adult feathers, according to researchers, not baby down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomba, ktorá včera ráno explodovala v automobile pri policajnom riaditeľstve v Gaziantepe v Turecku, zabila dvoch policajtov a zranila viac ako dvadsať ďalších ľudí.
mt: A bomb that exploded in a car outside a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Úrad guvernéra informoval, že boli zranení aj devätnásti príslušníci polície.
mt: 19 police officers were also injured, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polícia uviedla, že zo zodpovednosti za útok podozrieva údajného militanta Daesha (ISIS).
mt: Police have said that they suspect a Daesh (ISIS) militant of responsibility for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Zistili, že Slnko funguje na rovnakých základných princípoch ako iné hviezdy: Aktivita všetkých hviezd v systéme sa riadi ich svietivosťou, rotáciou a ničím iným.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system is governed by their brightness, rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Svietivosť a rotácia spoločne pomáhajú stanoviť Rossbyho číslo hviezdy, ktoré súvisí s plazmatickým tokom.
mt: Light and rotation together help to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Čím je hodnota Rossbyho čísla menšia, tým je hviezda menej aktívna vo vzťahu k magnetickej rotácii.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in relation to magnetic rotation.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasak sa v priebehu svojej cesty pri veľa príležitostiach dostal do problémov.
mt: Iwasak had many problems during his journey.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Olúpili ho piráti, v Tibete na neho zaútočil besný pes, unikol manželstvu v Nepále a bol uväznený v Indii.
mt: He was kidnapped by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped marriage in Nepal and was imprisoned in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Prevádzkové frekvencie štandardu 802.11n sú 2,4 GHz a 5,0 GHz.
mt: 802.11n operational frequencies are 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Za predpokladu, že základňová stanica má duálne rádiá, umožní jej to spätnú kompatibilitu s normami 802.11a, 802.11b a 802.11g.
mt: 802.11n will allow dual-radio base stations to be compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g standards.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Rýchlosti štandardu 802.11n sú podstatne vyššie ako u predošlých s maximálnou teoretickou priepustnosťou 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are significantly higher than previous standards with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ktorý je ženatý a má dve dospelé deti, nezanechal veľký dojem na Millera, s ktorým príbeh súvisel.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not leave a lasting impression on Miller, with whom the story was related.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Keď chceli, aby sa k tomu vyjadril, Miller povedal: „Mike rozpráva počas vypočúvania veľa...chystal som sa, takže som veľmi nepočul, čo rozprával.“
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the interrogation...I was preparing, so I didn't hear what he was talking about."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: „Do roku 2020 sa pokúsime znížiť emisie oxidu uhličitého na jednotku HDP o značnú mieru v porovnaní s hladinou v roku 2005.“
mt: “By 2020 we will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount compared to the 2005 level.”
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Neurčil rozsah zníženia a uviedol, že bude vychádzať z výkonu čínskej ekonomiky.
mt: He did not specify the extent of the cut and said it would be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu povzbudil rozvojové krajiny k tomu, „aby sa vyhli starej ceste znečisťovania na začiatku a čistenia na konci“.
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries to avoid the "old path of pollution at the beginning and cleaning at the end".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Dodal, že „by sa od nich nemalo žiadať, aby prebrali záväzky, ktoré prekračujú rámec ich vývojovej fázy, zodpovednosti a schopností.“
mt: He added that “it should not be expected that they take on commitments that exceed the scope of their developmental phase, responsibilities and capabilities.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iracká študijná skupina dnes o 12.00 GMT predstavila svoju správu.
mt: An Iraqi study group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Upozorňuje, že nikto nemôže zaručiť, že nejaká akcia v Iraku v tomto momente zastaví sektársku vojnu, rastúce násilie alebo prekĺznutie do chaosu.
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian war, rising violence or degenerate into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Správa sa začína žiadosťou o otvorenú diskusiu a formovanie konsenzu v Spojených štátoch o politike voči Blízkemu východu.
mt: The statement begins with a request for an open discussion and consensus formation in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Správa sa vyjadruje veľmi kriticky o takmer každom aspekte súčasnej politiky vlády voči Iraku a vyzýva na okamžitú zmenu jej smerovania.
mt: The statement is highly critical of nearly every aspect of the current government's policy towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Prvým z jeho 78 odporúčaní je, aby do konca tohto roka bola vyvinutá nová diplomatická iniciatíva na zabezpečenie irackých hraníc proti nepriateľským zásahom a na obnovenie diplomatických vzťahov s jeho susedmi.
mt: 1 of his 78 recommendations is to develop a new diplomatic initiative by the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile incursions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Súčasná senátorka a prvá dáma Argentíny Cristina Fernandez de Kirchnerová včera večer oznámila svoju prezidentskú kandidatúru v meste La Plata, čo je 50 kilometrov od Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, which is 50 kilometers from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kirchnerová informovala o svojom úmysle kandidovať za prezidentku v divadle Argentine Theatre, kde v roku 2005 odštartovala svoju kampaň na vstup do Senátu ako členka provinčnej delegácie Buenos Aires.
mt: Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, where in 2005 she launched her campaign to enter the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debatu vyvolala polemika o výdavkoch na pomoc a obnovu po hurikáne Katrina, ktorú niektorí fiškálni konzervatívci vtipne označili za „Bushovu dohodu o New Orleans“.
mt: 2005's Hurricane Katrina relief and rebuilding costs were criticized by some fiscal conservatives as the "Bush's Deal for New Orleans".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberálna kritika snahy o obnovu bola zameraná na na udeľovanie s obnovou súvisiacich zmlúv insiderom z Washingtonu.
mt: Liberal criticism of the effort to rebuild was focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to insiders from Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Pohrebu, ktorý sa konal v Ríme sa zúčastnilo viac ako štyri milióny ľudí.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Počet prítomných ľudí bol taký vysoký, že bolo nemožné, aby sa všetci dostali na pohreb na Námestí svätého Petra.
mt: The number of people present was so high that it was impossible for everyone to attend the funeral at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Na rôznych miestach v Ríme boli nainštalované viaceré veľké televízné obrazovky, vďaka ktorým mohli ľudia sledovať obrad.
mt: Large television screens were set up in various places in Rome, allowing people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: V mnohých ďalších mestách Talianska a vo zvyšku sveta, hlavne v Poľsku, boli pripravené podobné stanoviská, ktoré navštívilo veľké množstvo ľudí.
mt: In many other Italian cities and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar statements were made, which were visited by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historici kritizovali minulé praktiky FBI, pretože sústreďovala zdroje na ľahko objasniteľné prípady, najmä na prípady krádeží automobilov, aby zvýšili úspešnosť agentúry.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's past practices of focusing resources on easily solved cases, especially car thefts, to boost the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Iniciatívu obscénnosti začal finančne podporovať kongres vo fiškálnom roku 2005 a vyhlásil, že vo FBI sa pornografii dospelých musí venovať 10 agentov.
mt: 2005, the Congress began to financially support obscenity initiative and announced that in the FBI, pornography must be addressed by 10 agents.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa dosiahol 70 bodov, najvyššie skóre za smenu, iba na 41 loptičkách trafením 11 štvoriek a 2 šestiek.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs, the highest score for the innings, off 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Pálkari stredného radu, Sachin Tendulkar a Rahul Dravid, predviedli dobrý výkon a vytvorili sto runové partnerstvo.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put on a good show and created a century partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Po prehre kapitánskej bránky však India urobila iba 36 výbehov, pričom prehrala 7 bránok, aby ukončila zmenu.
mt: 36 shots on goal, 7 goals against, and the game was over.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush pricestoval do Singapuru 16. novembra ráno a začal svoju týždennú cestu po Ázii.
mt: 16 November 2006, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore and began a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Privítal ho singapurský podpredseda vlády Wong Kan Seng, a potom diskutoval so singapurským premiérom Lee Hsien Loongom o otázkach obchodu a terorizmu.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and then discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Po týždni strát v priebežných voľbách Bush rozprával publiku o rozširovaní obchodu v Ázii.
mt: 1 week after losses in the ongoing election, Bush spoke to the public about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Predseda vlády Stephen Harper súhlasil s tým, že po utorňajšom 25-minútovom stretnutí s vodcom NDP Jackom Laytonom v kancelárii predsedu vlády ešte pred druhým čítaním predloží výboru vládny návrh „zákona o čistom ovzduší“ na preskúmanie. Výbor je zložený zo zástupcov všetkých strán.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the Prime Minister's office before the second reading of the government's "clean air" bill. The committee is made up of representatives of all parties.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton požiadal o zmeny v environmentálnom zákone konzervatívcov počas stretnutia s predsedom vlády a požiadal o „dôkladné a úplné prepísanie“ environmentálneho zákona konzervatívnej strany.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the conservative party's environmental law during a meeting with the prime minister and asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the conservative party's environmental law.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Odkedy federálna zasiahla s cieľom prevziať kontrolu nad financovaním nemocnice Mersey v tasmánskom meste Devonport, tasmánska vláda a niektorí federálni poslanci tento čin kritizovali ako predvolebné divadlo pred federálnymi voľbami, ktoré sa majú vyhlásiť najneskôr v novembri.
mt: Since the federal government intervened to take control of the funding of the Mersey Hospital in the Tasmanian city of Devonport, the Tasmanian government and some federal MPs have criticized this as pre-election theater before the federal elections, which are to be announced at the latest in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Predseda vlády John Howard však uviedol, že nariadenie malo iba ochrániť nemocničné objekty pred znehodnotením zo strany tasmánskej vlády a poskytnúť im ďalších 45 miliónov AUD.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard, however, said the order was only to protect hospital facilities from the Tasmanian government's vandalism and provide them with an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Podľa najnovšej správy údaje o hladine mora naznačovali, že došlo k vzniku vlny tsunami. V blízkosti Pago Pago a Niue bola zaznamenaná určitá aktivita tsunami.
mt: According to the latest report, data on sea level indicated that a tsunami had occurred.  There was some tsunami activity near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Na ostrove Tonga neboli hlásené žiadne väčšie škody alebo zranenia, dočasne však došlo k výpadku energie, čo údajne zabránilo tonžským úradom aby zachytili varovanie pred vlnou tsunami, ktoré vyslalo PTWC.
mt: No major damage or injuries were reported on the island of Tonga, but a temporary power outage prevented Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Štrnásť škôl na Havaji, ktoré sa nachádzali na pobreží alebo v jeho blízkosti, bolo celú stredu zatvorených napriek zrušeným varovaniam.
mt: 14 schools on Hawaii, which were located on the coast or nearby, were closed all of Wednesday despite cancelled warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush toto oznámenie privítal.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bushov hovorca Gordon Johndroe označil prísľub Severnej Kórey za „hlavný krok k dosiahnutiu overiteľnej denuklearizácie Kórejského polostrova“.
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean pledge a "major step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Desiatou pomenovanou búrkou sezóny atlantických hurikánov je subtropická búrka Jerry, ktorá sa dnes sformovala v Atlantickom oceáne.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season is subtropical storm Jerry, which formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Národné centrum pre hurikány (NHC) hlási, že Jerry v tomto momente nepredstavuje žiadnu hrozbu pre krajinu.
mt: The National Hurricane Center reports that Jerry does not currently pose a threat to the country.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Podľa odhadov Armádneho zboru inžinierov Spojených štátov by 15 centimetrov zrážok mohlo prelomiť už predtým poškodené hrádze.
mt: 15 centimeters of rain could break levees already damaged by the storm, according to estimates by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Región Ninth Ward, ktorý bol počas hurikánu Katrina zaplavený až do výšky 6 metrov, je v súčasnosti vo vode až po pás, keďže bola neďaleká hrádza prekonaná.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 6 meters during Hurricane Katrina, is currently up to its waist in water, as a nearby levee was breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Voda sa po hrádzi rozlieva cez úsek, ktorý má šírku 30 metrov.
mt: 30 meters of the dam is breached.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Správca Commons Adam Cuerden vyjadril svoju frustráciu z vymazávania, keď minulý mesiac hovoril s Wikinews.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration with deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: „On [Wales] nás v podstate klamal od začiatku. Najprv sa tváril, že ide o právne dôvody. A potom predstieral, že nás počúva, až kým nedošlo k zmazaniu umenia.“
mt: “[Wales] was basically lying to us from the beginning. First he pretended it was a legal issue. Then he pretended to listen to us until the art was erased.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Spoločnosť bola podráždená, čo viedlo k súčasnému úsiliu o vypracovanie pravidiel týkajúcich sa sexuálneho obsahu na webe, ktorý navštevujú milióny médií s otvorenou licenciou.
mt: The company was upset, leading to the current effort to draft rules regarding sexual content on the web, which is visited by millions of open-source media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Práca, ktorú vykonali, bola zväčša teoretická, ale program bol napísaný tak, aby simuloval pozorovania o galaxii Strelec.
mt: The work they did was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the galaxy Centaurus.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Úkaz, ktorý tím očakával, by spôsobili prílivové sily medzi tmavou hmotou galaxie a tmavou hmotou Mliečnej dráhy.
mt: The team expected the phenomenon to be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Práve tak ako Mesiac pôsobí príťažlivou silou na Zem a spôsobuje príliv a odliv, tak pôsobí aj Mliečna dráha na galaxiu Strelec.
mt: Just as the Moon exerts a gravitational pull on Earth and causes tides, so does the Milky Way on the galaxy of Orion.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Vedci dospeli k tomu, že pôsobenie jednej tmavej hmoty na inú tmavú hmotu je rovnaké, ako je to u bežnej hmoty.
mt: Scientists have concluded that the effect of one dark matter on another dark matter is the same as it is for ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Táto teória hovorí, že väčšina temnej hmoty okolo galaxie sa nachádza okolo galaxie v akejsi svätožiare a tvorí ju množstvo malých častíc.
mt: This theory says that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is found around the galaxy in a sort of halo and is made up of a large number of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televízne správy ukazujú biely dym stúpajúci z továrne.
mt: TV reports show white smoke rising from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Miestne úrady vydali varovanie pre obyvateľov z okolia elektrárne, aby sa zdržiavali v interiéri, vypli klimatizáciu a nepili vodu z vodovodu.
mt: Local authorities issued a warning to residents near the power plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Podľa Japonskej agentúry pre jadrovú energiu bolo v elektrárni identifikované rádioaktívne cézium a jód.
mt: According to the Japanese Atomic Energy Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Odborníci sa domnievajú, že to naznačuje, že kontajnery s uránovým palivom na danom mieste mohli prasknúť a presakujú.
mt: Experts believe this indicates that the containers of uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Doktor Tony Moll objavil v juhoafrickom regióne KwaZulu-Natal tuberkulózu extrémne odolnú voči liekom (XDR-TB).
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal a tuberculosis strain extremely resistant to drugs (XDR-TB).
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: V rozhovore uviedol, že nový variant je „veľmi znepokojujúci a alarmujúci kvôli veľmi vysokej úmrtnosti“.
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant is "very worrying and alarming because of its very high mortality."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Doktor Moll sa domnieva, že niektorí pacienti sa mohli nakaziť v nemocnici a minimálne dvaja z nich boli zdravotnícki pracovníci.
mt: Dr. Moll believes some patients may have been infected in the hospital and at least two were healthcare workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
